item.title: 2016 in Review, Part 6 of 6
item.description: Some big goals for 2017, and some smaller ones too.
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho

item.title: 2016 in Review, Part 5 of 6
item.description: My strategy for productivity: less social media, careful use of my time, and embracing the "pomodoro technique".
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho

item.title: 2016 in Review, Part 4 of 6
item.description: Olo is great; I helped build (almost from scratch) a large mobile web application; I did some open-source software; it was a good year professionally.
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho

item.title: 2016 in Review, Part 3 of 6
item.description: On top of my 200,000 words of writing this year, I also published some 66 episodes and almost 20 hours of podcasting across four different shows.
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho

item.title: 2016 in Review, Part 2 of 6
item.description: One of my goals for 2016 was to continue writing not only on this blog but in other outlets. I did a *lot* of writing this year, but relatively little of it is published. But here's a look at some of the numbers! (And they are large!)
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho

item.title: 2016 in Review, Part 1 of 6
item.description: Accidental 20-mile runs, walking pneumonia, gaining weight because of metabolic shifts, and other adventures in my "fitness" in 2016.
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho

item.title: 2016 in Review, Introduction
item.description: 2016 was a long, difficult, strange, sometimes wonderful and sometimes dreadful year for me. It was one of the most professionally and scholastically enjoyable and rewarding years of my life, and also one of the most exhausting. As I often do at years-end, I am taking stock publicly of what went well, what went poorly, and what I might do different in a variety of categories!
item.dc:creator: Chris Krycho
